import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; function hideContent() { } @Component({ selector: 'app-checkout', templateUrl: './checkout.component.html', styleUrls: ['./checkout.component.scss'] }) export class CheckoutComponent implements OnInit { isContentHidden = false; constructor() {} ngOnInit() { } hideContent() { this.isContentHidden = true; } }
